name: Nimian Legends: BrightRidge Free
description:
Robert Kabwe is a solo indie dev creating nature-based worlds and games to explore.
Nimian Legends is an original fantasy world and the setting for BrightRidge. See the interactive map at http://NimianLegends.com

MORE GAMES
Plum Nut, a free rhythm platformer set to the music of the Nutcrackers Sugar Plum Fairy
https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/plum-nut/id580664043?mt=8

Zymbols: A free puzzle matcher with a twist
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zymbols/id986628436?mt=8

...AND A PERSONAL THANK YOU
I'd like to thank everyone who took time to leave a review. Positive or negative each one helps me understand how the game works in the real world, and I appreciate it:)
